Add.Name: URL
Add.Label: URL to like
Add.HelpText: The URL to like. If not specified, it defaults to the current page.

Add.Name: SendButton
Add.Label: Send button
Add.HelpText: If 'True', the Send button is included along with the Like button ('True' by default).

Add.Name: LayoutStyle
Add.Label: Layout style
Add.HelpText: The size and amount of social context next to the button ('standard' by default). Options: "standard" - social text to the right of the button and friends' profile photos below, "button_count" - the total number of likes to the right of the button, "box_count" -the total number of likes above the button.
Add.WidgetFunctionMarkup: <f:widgetfunction xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Composite.Widgets.String.Selector" label="" bindingsourcename=""><f:helpdefinition xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" helptext="" /><f:param xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Options"><f:function xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Composite.Utils.String.Split"><f:param name="String" value="standard,button_count,box_count" /></f:function></f:param></f:widgetfunction>

Add.Name: Width
Add.Label: Width
Add.HelpText: The width of the Like button, in pixels (450 by default).

Add.Name: ShowFaces
Add.Label: Show faces
Add.HelpText: If 'True', profile pictures are displayed below the button (standard layout only). 'True' by default.

Add.Name: VerbToDisplay
Add.Label: Verb to display
Add.HelpText: The verb to display on the button. Options: 'like', 'recommend'. Default is 'like'.
Add.WidgetFunctionMarkup: <f:widgetfunction xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Composite.Widgets.String.Selector" label="" bindingsourcename=""><f:helpdefinition xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" helptext="" /><f:param xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Options"><f:function xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Composite.Utils.String.Split"><f:param name="String" value="like,recommend" /></f:function></f:param></f:widgetfunction>

Add.Name: ColorScheme
Add.Label: Color scheme
Add.HelpText: The color scheme for the Like button. Options: 'light', 'dark'. Default is 'light'.
Add.WidgetFunctionMarkup: <f:widgetfunction xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Composite.Widgets.String.Selector" label="" bindingsourcename=""><f:helpdefinition xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" helptext="" /><f:param xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Options"><f:function xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Composite.Utils.String.Split"><f:param name="String" value="light,dark" /></f:function></f:param></f:widgetfunction>

Add.Name: Font
Add.Label: Font
Add.HelpText: The font used in the button. Options: 'arial', 'lucida grande', 'segoe ui', 'tahoma', 'trebuchet ms', 'verdana' .
Add.WidgetFunctionMarkup: <f:widgetfunction xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Composite.Widgets.String.Selector" label="" bindingsourcename=""><f:helpdefinition xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" helptext="" /><f:param xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Options"><f:function xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Composite.Utils.String.Split"><f:param name="String" value="arial,lucida grande,segoe ui,tahoma,trebuchet ms,verdana" /></f:function></f:param></f:widgetfunction>

Add.Name: Admins
Add.Label: Admins
Add.HelpText: A comma-separated list of the IDs of Facebook users who administer this page.

Add.Name: Title
Add.Label: Title
Add.HelpText: The title of your object as it should appear within the graph.

Add.Name: Type
Add.Label: Type
Add.HelpText: The type of your object. Default is 'website'.
Add.WidgetFunctionMarkup: <f:widgetfunction xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Composite.Widgets.String.Selector" label="" bindingsourcename=""><f:helpdefinition xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" helptext="" /><f:param xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Options"><f:function xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Composite.Utils.String.Split"><f:param name="String" value="activity,actor,album,article,athlete,author,band,bar,blog,book,cafe,cause,city,company,country,director,drink,food,game,government,hotel,landmark,movie,musician,non_profit,politician,product,public_figure,restaurant,school,song,sport,sports_league,sports_team,state_province,tv_show,university,website" /></f:function></f:param></f:widgetfunction>

Add.Name: Image
Add.Label: Image
Add.HelpText: The URL to an image that represents your object within the graph. The image must be at least 50px by 50px and have a maximum aspect ratio of 3:1. Supported formats: PNG, JPEG and GIF.

Add.Name: URL
Add.Label: URL
Add.HelpText: The canonical URL of your object that will be used as its permanent ID in the graph. Default is current page URL.

Add.Name: SiteName
Add.Label: Site name
Add.HelpText: A human-readable name for your site.

Add.Name: Description
Add.Label: Description
Add.HelpText: A one to two sentence description of your page. Default is current page description.

Add.Name: ApplicationIDs
Add.Label: Application IDs
Add.HelpText: A comma-separated list of Facebook Platform application IDs if used.
